content: over the past few months - due to some people cancelling/never paying or where I had to order a higher quantity the the amount requested for group buys (ie Ballet Economic Preppers wallets - had to order 30 minimum - originally only sold 20)  Due to these things, I have extras and I don't care to keep extras   and sometimes I buy stuff I already had - oops!Prices are simple - selling for same price I paid 1.  Balletcrypto Economic Preppers - original post link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5422145.0I have 10 6 3  2 1 remaining - $35 ea2. Acrylic business card holders - magnetic (work in landscape only) works great for Ballet plastic cards, coldkeys or similar - see image below of one holding my Balletcrypto business cardI have 9 5 remaining: $10 ea3. Linking some small form asics I have listed over in the hardware section as wellhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5415502.04 1 - Terminus R606’s1 - Goldshell HS1+1 - Goldshell LBY box miner$200 EA includes free shipping within the US for the miners only.4. CryptoCash board game - link to the game: https://www.walmart.com/ip/Crypto-Cash-Game-Fast-Paced-Bitcoin-Betting-Game-for-Teens-and-Adults-Aged-14-and-Up/906544645I have 4 3 2 remaining: $10 ea5. Tangem "VOYR" NFC multicurrency wallet - ordered some of these in bulk as it made the cost cheaper than a single wallet.I have 24  22 remaining: $5 ea6. Orange Pills (tic tacs with Bitcoin logo) - original thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5427186.0I have 22  20 9 remaining: $7 ea7.  Stellar Lumens 3 coin set - Copper, Aluminum, Brass - originally bought here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5304942.20I have 1 set: $75 for the set8. Litecoin HODL My Beer bottle opener - got them from here: https://crypto-keys.com/pages/bottle-openerI have 1 remaining: $108. FlyeLyfe "HODL Your Horses" XMR poster and XMR Conference poster - originally bought from minerjones - threads are in archival and blank though so no sense to link them. XMR poster is numbered 122 - both are flat and in the same frame at this point. I have the single set - $75 for both9. Balletcrypto REAL Series Gold Plated wallets - can be seen here https://store.ballet.com/products/ballet-wallet?variant=43291273199779 I have 4 2 - $75 ea10. Custom "The CryptoBill" MMLLC notes - can be seen here/purchased here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5452037.0I have 45 of the DIY available and 46 of the assembled (keys generated by me) available - $10 eafor shipping:1. I can ship direct - price determined by actual cost of packaging and postage.2. I can hand off to minerjones for consolidation/reshipping. (no cost from me)3. I can hold it for consolidation and reship it at a later date of your choosing.Before sending pymt - please send DM to verify if item is still available - I will update this thread as I can as well. For payment:BTC (preferred) at: bc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4esStrike: strike.me/moparminingllcLN Invoice: will generate as neededLN address: moparminingllc@voltpay.appPlease DM me before sending any other form of payment  - and be wary of any random DM's - be sure they are coming from me.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.created_time: December 14, 2022, 03:57:20 AMLast edit: May 05, 2023, 01:10:58 AM by MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: to clean up OP but to leave the references to sold items, I will list items here that have been sold and are no longer available:Balletcrypto 2023 Gold Rabbit Limited Edition wallet - original post link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5416413.01 sold for $99REAL Series Bitcoin Ballet wallets - standard ballet wallets - can see here: https://store.ballet.com/products/real-wallet?variant=42533535219875 3 sold for $30 eaREAL Bitcoin 2022 Holiday Gifting Edition - Original post link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5419469.0 1 sold for $65Balletcrypto Bitcoin Day REAL Series Wallets - original thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5433711.0 4 sold for $35 eaBalletcrypto CFC Conference REAL Series Wallets - original thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5436094.0 5 sold for $35 eaBitcoin Magazine "To The Moon" issue - got these as part of my annual subscription but got the magazine also while at Bitcoin 2022 Conference - so the subscriptions are extras. 2 sold for $10 eaObolite 3d printed coins - two DOGE and one ETHER - originally purchased here, bought set just to get the BTC one - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5429857.0 - all three sold for $50 combinedMUE - Monetary Unit coin, 24K gold plated comes with 2 holograms - Do not recall where I got this - sorry.I have 1 remaining: sold for $302013 CryptoVest "Zinodaur" - wallet is not funded but does come with original paper with address typed and in QR format - the discoloration on the coin is from the paper (it has always been kept folded inside the airtite with the coin. I bought this off forums so cannot link to the original thread. But these currently are on eBay for prices ranging from $250 to $1300 - I have 1: sold for $175REAL Series Ravencoin Wallet: sold for $30
